caption.center: SANDRA SUE DIAZ, Petitioner-Defendant v .STEVEN S. ALM, Circuit Court
Judge of the First Circuit, Respondent.

center.underline: ORDER DENYING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF MANDAMUS

opinion.panel: By: Moon, C.J., LEVINSON, NAKAYAMA, ACOBA, and DUFFY, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
Upon review of the Application for Writ of Mandamus, the Declaration of Counsel, and Exhibits A-F in support of the Application, it appears the exhibits do not support the factual allegations set forth in the application. Therefore,
IT IS HEREBY ORDERED, pursuant to Rule 21(c) of the Hawai'i Rules of Appellate Procedure, that the application is denied.
DATED: Honolulu, Hawai'i, December 23, 2008.
